name: the-swan-station
description: SHOGUN ECO Swan Station - Modular decentralized station management system

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:copy && npm run build:optimize && npm run build:verify
scripts.build:copy: copyfiles -u 1 "src/**/*" dist/ && copyfiles -u 0 "assets/**/*" dist/ && copyfiles -u 0 "index.html" dist/ && copyfiles -u 0 "test-css.html" dist/
scripts.build:optimize: npm run optimize:audio && npm run optimize:images && npm run optimize:modules
scripts.build:verify: echo 'Build completed - checking files:' && dir dist && dir dist\src
scripts.cleanup: rimraf node_modules && rimraf dist && del yarn.lock && echo 'Cleanup completed'
scripts.analyze: npm run analyze:size && npm run analyze:performance
scripts.analyze:size: echo 'Analyzing bundle size...' && find src -name '*.js' -exec wc -l {} +

author: SHOGUN ECO
